issues.description: The problem statement text refers to attributes as `inscribedStudents` and `guestStudents`, but both the UML diagram and the solution implementation use `numberOfInscribedStudents` and `numberOfGuestStudents` for the same fields. This inconsistency between the textual description and the actual code identifiers can cause confusion when students map requirements to implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the problem statement to refer to the attributes as `numberOfInscribedStudents` and `numberOfGuestStudents` so that the terminology matches the UML diagram and the template/solution code.
